word:
MR No. 1004 - J. N. Andrews, a Gifted Worker

     From what God has shown me from time to time, Brother Andrews was his chosen servant, to do a work others could not do. I have testimonies where the most distinct reference is made to his precious gift. The experience he has obtained has qualified him for the important work for these last days.-- Letter 13, 1871. (Written September 2, 1871, to James White, from Camp Ground, Skowhegan, Maine.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. August 4, 1983
